name: Bluniverse
description: Bluniverse, also called Blue Universe, is a 50/50 hybrid strain bred by Dynasty Seeds. Mothered by Blue Magoo and fathered by Ms. Universe, Bluniverse inherits a complex flavor profile of blueberry, cherry, and vanilla spice. Its initial effects focus themselves cerebrally, with high-flying euphoria that tapers into pacifying relaxation over time. This hybrid may express one of three different phenotypes, one that takes after Blue Magoo, another taking after Ms. Universe, and a third that exhibits a balance of each parentâ€™s characteristics.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Euphoric, Uplifted, Happy, Hungry, Stress, Depression, Headaches, Pain, Nausea, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes
